select.if:
select * from ( ${listado} ) x left join ( select region_edomex_2017, region_edomex_2017,municipio, region_edomex_2017,municipio,seccion,
sum(case when _1 = 'NC' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) nc_hombres,sum(case when _1 = 'NC' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) nc_mujeres, sum(case when _1 = 'NC' then 1 else 0 end) nc_total, sum(case when _1 = 'GOBIERNO_FEDERAL' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) gobierno_federal_hombres,sum(case when _1 = 'GOBIERNO_FEDERAL' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) gobierno_federal_mujeres, sum(case when _1 = 'GOBIERNO_FEDERAL' then 1 else 0 end) gobierno_federal_total, sum(case when _1 = 'GOBIERNO_ESTATAL' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) gobierno_estatal_hombres,sum(case when _1 = 'GOBIERNO_ESTATAL' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) gobierno_estatal_mujeres, sum(case when _1 = 'GOBIERNO_ESTATAL' then 1 else 0 end) gobierno_estatal_total, sum(case when _1 = 'GOBIERNO_MUNICIPAL' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) gobierno_municipal_hombres,sum(case when _1 = 'GOBIERNO_MUNICIPAL' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) gobierno_municipal_mujeres, sum(case when _1 = 'GOBIERNO_MUNICIPAL' then 1 else 0 end) gobierno_municipal_total, sum(case when _1 = 'NO_SABE' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) no_sabe_hombres,sum(case when _1 = 'NO_SABE' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) no_sabe_mujeres, sum(case when _1 = 'NO_SABE' then 1 else 0 end) no_sabe_total, sum(case when _1 = 'NO_SABE' then 1 else 0 end) no_sabe_total,
sum(case when _2 = 'NC' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) nc_hombres,sum(case when _2 = 'NC' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) nc_mujeres, sum(case when _2 = 'NC' then 1 else 0 end) nc_total, sum(case when _2 = 'SI' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) si_hombres,sum(case when _2 = 'SI' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) si_mujeres, sum(case when _2 = 'SI' then 1 else 0 end) si_total, sum(case when _2 = 'NO' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) no_hombres,sum(case when _2 = 'NO' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) no_mujeres, sum(case when _2 = 'NO' then 1 else 0 end) no_total,
sum(case when _3 = 'NC' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) nc_hombres,sum(case when _3 = 'NC' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) nc_mujeres, sum(case when _3 = 'NC' then 1 else 0 end) nc_total, sum(case when _3 = 'BUENO' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) bueno_hombres,sum(case when _3 = 'BUENO' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) bueno_mujeres, sum(case when _3 = 'BUENO' then 1 else 0 end) bueno_total, sum(case when _3 = 'REGULAR' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) regular_hombres,sum(case when _3 = 'REGULAR' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) regular_mujeres, sum(case when _3 = 'REGULAR' then 1 else 0 end) regular_total, sum(case when _3 = 'MALO' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) malo_hombres,sum(case when _3 = 'MALO' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) malo_mujeres, sum(case when _3 = 'MALO' then 1 else 0 end) malo_total,
sum(case when _4 = 'NC' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) nc_hombres,sum(case when _4 = 'NC' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) nc_mujeres, sum(case when _4 = 'NC' then 1 else 0 end) nc_total, sum(case when _4 = 'BUENO' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) bueno_hombres,sum(case when _4 = 'BUENO' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) bueno_mujeres, sum(case when _4 = 'BUENO' then 1 else 0 end) bueno_total, sum(case when _4 = 'REGULAR' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) regular_hombres,sum(case when _4 = 'REGULAR' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) regular_mujeres, sum(case when _4 = 'REGULAR' then 1 else 0 end) regular_total, sum(case when _4 = 'MALO' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) malo_hombres,sum(case when _4 = 'MALO' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) malo_mujeres, sum(case when _4 = 'MALO' then 1 else 0 end) malo_total, sum(case when _4 = 'NO_RECIBO' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) no_recibe_hombres,sum(case when _4 = 'NO_RECIBO' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) no_recibe_mujeres, sum(case when _4 = 'NO_RECIBO' then 1 else 0 end) no_recibe_total,
sum(case when _5 = 'NC' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) nc_hombres,sum(case when _5 = 'NC' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) nc_mujeres, sum(case when _5 = 'NC' then 1 else 0 end) nc_total, sum(case when _5 = 'SI' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) si_hombres,sum(case when _5 = 'SI' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) si_mujeres, sum(case when _5 = 'SI' then 1 else 0 end) si_total, sum(case when _5 = 'NO' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) no_hombres,sum(case when _5 = 'NO' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) no_mujeres, sum(case when _5 = 'NO' then 1 else 0 end) no_total,
sum(case when b.sexo = 'H' then 1 else 0 end) hombres, sum(case when b.sexo = 'M' then 1 else 0 end) mujeres,count(*) total from encuestas_resultados.e_edomex_prospera a join encuestas.encuesta_edomex b on (a.id_contacto::integer = b.id_interno) group by region_edomex_2017 group by region_edomex_2017,municipio group by region_edomex_2017,municipio,seccion ) y on (x.id = y.region_edomex_2017 y.municipio y.seccion) order by x.id order by total

select region_edomex_2017,municipio,seccion,id_interno id,nombre||' '||apellido_paterno||' '||apellido_materno nombre,
(case when _1 = 'NC' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) nc_hombres,(case when _1 = 'NC' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) nc_mujeres, (case when _1 = 'NC' then 1 else 0 end) nc_total, (case when _1 = 'GOBIERNO_FEDERAL' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) gobierno_federal_hombres,(case when _1 = 'GOBIERNO_FEDERAL' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) gobierno_federal_mujeres, (case when _1 = 'GOBIERNO_FEDERAL' then 1 else 0 end) gobierno_federal_total, (case when _1 = 'GOBIERNO_ESTATAL' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) gobierno_estatal_hombres,(case when _1 = 'GOBIERNO_ESTATAL' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) gobierno_estatal_mujeres, (case when _1 = 'GOBIERNO_ESTATAL' then 1 else 0 end) gobierno_estatal_total, (case when _1 = 'GOBIERNO_MUNICIPAL' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) gobierno_municipal_hombres,(case when _1 = 'GOBIERNO_MUNICIPAL' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) gobierno_municipal_mujeres, (case when _1 = 'GOBIERNO_MUNICIPAL' then 1 else 0 end) gobierno_municipal_total, (case when _1 = 'NO_SABE' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) no_sabe_hombres,(case when _1 = 'NO_SABE' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) no_sabe_mujeres, (case when _1 = 'NO_SABE' then 1 else 0 end) no_sabe_total, (case when _1 = 'NO_SABE' then 1 else 0 end) no_sabe_total,
(case when _2 = 'NC' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) nc_hombres,(case when _2 = 'NC' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) nc_mujeres, (case when _2 = 'NC' then 1 else 0 end) nc_total, (case when _2 = 'SI' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) si_hombres,(case when _2 = 'SI' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) si_mujeres, (case when _2 = 'SI' then 1 else 0 end) si_total, (case when _2 = 'NO' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) no_hombres,(case when _2 = 'NO' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) no_mujeres, (case when _2 = 'NO' then 1 else 0 end) no_total,
(case when _3 = 'NC' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) nc_hombres,(case when _3 = 'NC' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) nc_mujeres, (case when _3 = 'NC' then 1 else 0 end) nc_total, (case when _3 = 'BUENO' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) bueno_hombres,(case when _3 = 'BUENO' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) bueno_mujeres, (case when _3 = 'BUENO' then 1 else 0 end) bueno_total, (case when _3 = 'REGULAR' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) regular_hombres,(case when _3 = 'REGULAR' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) regular_mujeres, (case when _3 = 'REGULAR' then 1 else 0 end) regular_total, (case when _3 = 'MALO' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) malo_hombres,(case when _3 = 'MALO' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) malo_mujeres, (case when _3 = 'MALO' then 1 else 0 end) malo_total,
(case when _4 = 'NC' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) nc_hombres,(case when _4 = 'NC' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) nc_mujeres, (case when _4 = 'NC' then 1 else 0 end) nc_total, (case when _4 = 'BUENO' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) bueno_hombres,(case when _4 = 'BUENO' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) bueno_mujeres, (case when _4 = 'BUENO' then 1 else 0 end) bueno_total, (case when _4 = 'REGULAR' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) regular_hombres,(case when _4 = 'REGULAR' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) regular_mujeres, (case when _4 = 'REGULAR' then 1 else 0 end) regular_total, (case when _4 = 'MALO' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) malo_hombres,(case when _4 = 'MALO' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) malo_mujeres, (case when _4 = 'MALO' then 1 else 0 end) malo_total, (case when _4 = 'NO_RECIBO' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) no_recibe_hombres,(case when _4 = 'NO_RECIBO' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) no_recibe_mujeres, (case when _4 = 'NO_RECIBO' then 1 else 0 end) no_recibe_total,
(case when _5 = 'NC' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) nc_hombres,(case when _5 = 'NC' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) nc_mujeres, (case when _5 = 'NC' then 1 else 0 end) nc_total, (case when _5 = 'SI' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) si_hombres,(case when _5 = 'SI' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) si_mujeres, (case when _5 = 'SI' then 1 else 0 end) si_total, (case when _5 = 'NO' and b.sexo ='H' then 1 else 0 end) no_hombres,(case when _5 = 'NO' and b.sexo ='M' then 1 else 0 end) no_mujeres, (case when _5 = 'NO' then 1 else 0 end) no_total,
(case when b.sexo = 'H' then 1 else 0 end) hombres, (case when b.sexo = 'M' then 1 else 0 end) mujeres,1 total from encuestas_resultados.e_edomex_prospera a join encuestas.encuesta_edomex b on (a.id_contacto::integer = b.id_interno) where b.seccion =${seccion}
